name: Blobberboi
description:
A Very simple game where you must navigate Blobberboi to collect his coins. Avoid purple bricks that are toxic to Blobberboi.

Blobberboi was the first real project I worked on, I created Blobberboi a little while ago and did nothing with him so I used him for this. I may expand upon him some day but I am not sure yet. 

Credits:

 Developer - Myself, Winona Cabot

Clickteam Fusion 2.5 by Clickteam

Guide I used for base by qubodupDeb on Youtube.
